text: Teide is an active volcano on the island of Tenerife (Canary Islands, Spain).Lunar and Planetary Institute, "Pico de Teide, Tenerife"; retrieved 2012-6-15. The volcano is 3,718 meters above sea level. It is the highest mountain in Spain and any island in the Atlantic Ocean. It is 7,500 meters above the ocean floor, it is the third largest volcano in the world from its base. Located in the Teide National Park declared in 2007 as a World Heritage Site by UNESCO.UNESCO, "Teide National Park"; retrieved 2012-6-15. == Related pages == * List of volcanos * Dormant volcano * Extinct volcano ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Volcanoes of Africa Category:Province of Santa Cruz de Tenerife
title: Teide
